channel.title: The Amazing Jondi & Spesh Present Loöq Radio
channel.description: An hour of top dance music tunes selected by The Amazing Jondi & Spesh of Loöq Records, including the latest releases on Loöq (www.looq.com).
channel.itunes:author: The Amazing Jondi & Spesh
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Amazing Jondi & Spesh Present Loöq Radio

item.title: Marc Kate interviews Jondi & Spesh re: Angles of Estrangement
item.description: Marc Kate (aka Silencefiction), founder of techno label Untitled & After, interviews Jondi & Spesh re: their new ambient album "Angles of Estrangement." If you're curious as to the concepts behind the album, production secrets, and "dance music deconstruction" back-story, you need to hear this.
